description: Built for backpackers and beloved by bike commuters, the Men's Minimalist Pant is a lifesaver in unexpected downpours. Lightweight and packable GORE-TEX Paclite® offers wind and water protection without bulk, and articulated knees and an adjustable drawcord hem give you room to make your next move.
name: Marmot Minimalist GTX Pants, Reg - Mens

specs.value: GORE-TEX Paclite® 100% Recycled Polyester Plain weave
